Chapter A.5 US Military Deployments and Minority Communities 5.1 Descriptive Information

Chapter A.5 US Military Deployments and Minority Communities This chapter provides supplementary information related to Chapter 4 of the book, focusing on how US military deployments interact with and are viewed by minority communities. 5.1 Descriptive Information 5.1.1 Prior Specification Tables for Minority Models Table 5.1: Priors specifications for bivariate Troops contact models. prior class Figure 5.4: Posterior predictive checks for full contact models and attitudes towards the US troops outcome variable. Figure 5.6: Posterior predictive checks for full contact models and attitudes towards the US people outcome variable. Figure 5.7: Posterior predictive checks for contact models and attitudes towards the US troops outcome variable. Models look at Japan only and contain varying effects for minority status across provinces. Models look at Japan only and contain varying effects for minority status across provinces. Models look at Japan only and contain varying effects for minority status across provinces.
